meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>fire</kanji> in a <kanji>bottle</kanji> that makes a <kanji>big fire</kanji> when thrown is called a <vocabulary>Molotov Cocktail</vocabulary>. Don't throw them in the house please.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
